description: Tsubaki Kentarou is a transfer student with a crush on Shiraishi Urara. He is revealed to be the true cause of the fire in Sarushima Maria`s visions, as he likes to fry tempura in the old schoolhouse whenever he is depressed, which happens after Shiraishi rejects him. He later joins the Supernatural Research Club.
name: Tsubaki Kentarou
